resources.string: Please enter an unbalanced chemical equation, and click ENTER. You can also enter a molecule to get the molar mass. \nExamples:
Balanced reaction \nEx:\n 2 C₆H₆ + 15 O₂ = 12 CO₂ + 6 H₂O

Nectar is a chemical balancer that is also used to measure molar masses of molecules.


Despite all the care taken to ensure that the balancing of the chemical equations and the calculation of the molar masses are exact, we can make no guarantees and hold no responsibility for incorrect results.


For any question or proposal, please contact the Support Service.
